import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { HeartIcon, UserGroupIcon, ShieldCheckIcon, GlobeAltIcon, PlayIcon, PauseIcon } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline'; import { Line } from 'react-chartjs-2'; import { Chart as ChartJS, CategoryScale, LinearScale, PointElement, LineElement, Title, Tooltip, Legend, Filler } from 'chart.js'; ChartJS.register( CategoryScale, LinearScale, PointElement, LineElement, Title, Tooltip, Legend, Filler ); const About = () => { const [isPlaying, setIsPlaying] = useState(false); const [counters, setCounters] = useState({ reports: 0, lives: 0, volunteers: 0, stations: 0 }); const handleVideoPlay = () => { setIsPlaying(true); }; const handleVideoPause = () => { setIsPlaying(false); }; useEffect(() => { const targetValues = { reports: 1452, lives: 38, volunteers: 75, stations: 125 }; const duration = 2000; // 2 seconds const steps = 60; const stepDuration = duration / steps; let currentStep = 0; const interval = setInterval(() => { currentStep++; setCounters({ reports: Math.floor((targetValues.reports * currentStep) / steps), lives: Math.floor((targetValues.lives * currentStep) / steps), volunteers: Math.floor((targetValues.volunteers * currentStep) / steps), stations: Math.floor((targetValues.stations * currentStep) / steps) }); if (currentStep === steps) { clearInterval(interval); } }, stepDuration); return () => clearInterval(interval); }, []); const chartData = { labels: ['2019', '2020', '2021', '2022', '2023', '2024'], datasets: [ { label: 'Unclaimed Bodies', data: [1200, 1350, 1500, 1650, 1800, 1950], borderColor: 'rgb(255, 99, 71)', backgroundColor: 'rgba(255, 99, 71, 0.1)', borderWidth: 3, pointBackgroundColor: 'rgb(255, 99, 71)', pointBorderColor: '#fff', pointBorderWidth: 2, pointRadius: 6, pointHoverRadius: 8, tension: 0.4, fill: true, gradient: { color: { type: 'linear', x: 0, y: 0, x2: 0, y2: 1, colorStops: [ { offset: 0, color: 'rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.8)' }, { offset: 1, color: 'rgba(255, 99, 71, 0.8)' } ] } } } ] }; const chartOptions = { responsive: true, maintainAspectRatio: false, plugins: { legend: { display: false }, title: { display: true, text: [ 'Unclaimed Bodies Found in the Last 5 Years (India)', 'A Growing Crisis We Can\'t Ignore' ], color: '#003f88', font: { size: 24, weight: 'bold', family: 'Merriweather' }, padding: { top: 20, bottom: 20 } }, subtitle: { display: true, text: 'A Growing Crisis We Can\'t Ignore', color: '#666', font: { size: 16, style: 'italic', family: 'Poppins' }, padding: { bottom: 20 } }, tooltip: { backgroundColor: 'rgba(0, 63, 136, 0.9)', titleColor: '#fff', bodyColor: '#fff', borderColor: '#ffd700', borderWidth: 1, padding: 12, displayColors: false, callbacks: { label: function(context) { return `Number of Bodies: ${context.raw}`; } } } }, scales: { y: { beginAtZero: true, grid: { color: 'rgba(0, 63, 136, 0.1)', drawBorder: false }, ticks: { color: '#003f88', font: { family: 'Poppins' }, callback: function(value) { return value.toLocaleString(); } }, title: { display: true, text: 'Number of Bodies', color: '#003f88', font: { size: 14, weight: 'bold', family: 'Poppins' } } }, x: { grid: { color: 'rgba(0, 63, 136, 0.1)', drawBorder: false }, ticks: { color: '#003f88', font: { family: 'Poppins' } }, title: { display: true, text: 'Year', color: '#003f88', font: { size: 14, weight: 'bold', family: 'Poppins' } } } } }; return (
{/* Hero Section with Video Background */}

About Avyakta

Empowering communities to bring dignity to the unclaimed through technology and compassion.

{/* Story Section */}

Every Unclaimed Life Tells a Story Let's Not Ignore It Anymore

In India, every hour, several unidentified dead bodies are found left unreported, unnamed, and untouched. Behind every such body lies a family in pain, a mystery unsolved, and a society that chose to look away.

Why this platform matters now:

  • Increasing urban migration has left more people vulnerable to anonymity.

  • Police resources are stretched, making timely intervention harder.

  • People hesitate to report cases fearing involvement in legal procedures.

But what if you could:

  • Help anonymously, with just one click?

  • Save a life, bring closure, or stop a crime from happening again?

Let's change the way we respond. Let's be human first.

{/* Counters Section */}

{counters.reports}+

Total Unclaimed Reports Handled

Click to learn more

{counters.lives}

Lives Saved Through Timely Alerts

See success stories

{counters.volunteers}

Active Volunteers Supporting

Join our volunteers

{counters.stations}+

Police Stations Connected

View network map

{/* Graph Section */}

"This graph isn't just data it's lives left unclaimed. Let's bring them back into the story."

Total Reports

{counters.reports}+

Yearly Increase

15%

{/* Mission and Vision */}

Our Mission

At Avyakta, we believe that every individual deserves dignity in life and death. Our mission is to leverage technology to help identify and respond to unclaimed bodies with respect and compassion, while providing closure to families and communities.

Compassion
Dignity
Community
Impact

Our Vision

To create a world where no life goes unnoticed, where every individual receives the dignity they deserve, and where technology serves as a bridge between the lost and their loved ones.

{/* Impact Section */}

Our Impact

Through our dedicated efforts, we have helped bring dignity to countless lives and provided closure to families across the nation.

1000+

Cases Resolved

500+

Families Helped

50+

Cities Covered

{/* Team Section */}

Our Team

Meet the dedicated individuals working tirelessly to make a difference.

{[ { name: 'Dr. Rajesh Kumar', role: 'Founder & CEO', image: '/images/team/ceo.jpg', bio: '20+ years of experience in humanitarian work and technology innovation.' }, { name: 'Priya Sharma', role: 'Head of Operations', image: '/images/team/operations.jpg', bio: 'Expert in NGO management and community development.' }, { name: 'Amit Patel', role: 'Technical Lead', image: '/images/team/tech.jpg', bio: 'Passionate about using technology for social impact.' } ].map((member) => (

{member.name}

{member.role}

{member.bio}

))}
{/* Call to Action */}

Join Our Mission

Together, we can bring dignity to the forgotten and make a lasting impact in our communities.

Know How it Works Contact Us
); }; export default About;
